data.title: Pablo Neruda
data.meta_description: Pablo Neruda - Free download as Open Office file (.odt), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Pablo Neruda was a Chilean poet born in 1904 who became renowned for his politically charged poetry and support of communism. He began writing poetry at a young age and published his first works in his teens. Throughout his life he held diplomatic posts while continuing to write, with works exploring themes of love, politics, and nature. Neruda received the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1971 and is considered one of the most influential poets of the 20th century for his innovative style and passionate advocacy.
